quote: Happiness is pretty simple: someone to love, something to do, something to look forward to. – Rita Mae Brown
fact: ”Judge Judy” has a $25,000,000 salary, while Supreme Court Justice Ginsberg has a $190,100 salary.
joke: Did you hear the news? FedEx and UPS are merging. They’re going to go by the name Fed-Up from now on.
